title: Call of the Blood
content:
Call of the Blood Type Quest Act Act TBA Location TBA Reward __reward__

Call of the Blood

Call of the Blood is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Call of the Blood can be acquired during Act TBA. This quest are part of the Personal Quests that you can get in the game. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Call of the Blood Objectives

Face your hunger.

I'm... alive? Well - I'm not on fire - which is something for a vampire spawn standing in the sun. And I'm free! Free from those vile mind flayers and free from Cazador Szarr. But it won't be long before my old master realises I'm missing, so I had better find out what in the hells is going on and quickly.
